item.title: Robots could replace sniffer dogs at airports!
item.description: Tel Aviv University researchers are working on robots with the sense of smell. They could detect drugs, explosives and even food safety. What other uses can you imagine for a smelling robot?
item.keywords: DWVC,DWDigital, Robot, Sniffer, Dogs, Airport, Travel, Flight

media:content.media:title: Robots could replace sniffer dogs at airports!

item.title: When hope dies: After the earthquake
item.description: The earthquake in southeastern Turkey affected hundreds of thousands of Syrian refugees. Many are still waiting for a sign of life from their relatives but time is running out and there is not much help from the authorities.

media:content.media:title: When hope dies: After the earthquake
